## IUiSettingsClient.getAll property

Gets the metadata about all uiSettings, including the type, default value, and user value for each key.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getAll: () => Readonly<Record<string, UiSettingsParams & UserProvidedValues>>;
```
